info.name: Laravel Stripe SaaS Billing API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Laravel Stripe SaaS Billing System.

## Authentication
This API uses Bearer token authentication via Laravel Sanctum. After registering or logging in, include the token in the Authorization header:

```
Authorization: Bearer {your-token}
```

## Base URL
All endpoints are prefixed with `/api/v1/`

## Response Format
All responses are in JSON format. Successful responses typically include:
- `message`: A human-readable status message
- `data` or resource name: The requested resource(s)

## Error Handling
Error responses include:
- `message`: Error description
- `error`: Additional error details (when applicable)
- `errors`: Validation errors object (for 422 responses)

item.name: Authentication
item.description: User authentication endpoints for registration, login, logout, and profile retrieval.

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Request Body:**
- `name` (required): User's full name
- `email` (required): Valid email address
- `password` (required): Minimum 8 characters
- `password_confirmation` (required): Must match password

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "message": "User registered successfully",
    "user": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Doe",
        "email": "john@example.com",
        "email_verified_at": null,
        "stripe_id": null,
        "pm_type": null,
        "pm_last_four": null,
        "trial_ends_at": null,
        "has_active_subscription": false,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z"
    },
    "token": "1|abcdef123456789..."
}

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
Authenticate user and receive access token.

**Request Body:**
- `email` (required): Registered email address
- `password` (required): User's password

**Note:** The test script automatically saves the token to the collection variable for subsequent requests.

Get the currently authenticated user's profile.

**Authentication:** Required

Logout the current user and revoke the access token.

**Authentication:** Required

item.name: Plans
item.description: Subscription plans endpoints. These are public endpoints that don't require authentication.

request.description:
Get a list of all active subscription plans.

**Authentication:** Not required

**Note:** Only active plans are returned, sorted by `sort_order`.

request.description:
Get details of a specific subscription plan.

**Authentication:** Not required

**URL Parameters:**
- `plan`: Plan ID (integer)

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "plan": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Basic",
        "slug": "basic",
        "description": "Perfect for individuals and small projects",

            "5 Projects",
            "10 GB Storage",
            "Email Support",
            "Basic Analytics"
        ],

        "yearly_price": 9990,
        "formatted_monthly_price": "$9.99",
        "formatted_yearly_price": "$99.90",

        "sort_order": 1,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}

item.name: Subscriptions
item.description: Subscription management endpoints for creating, viewing, canceling, resuming, and changing subscriptions.

request.description:
Get the current user's active subscription.

**Authentication:** Required

response.name: Success Response (With Subscription)
response.body:
{
    "subscription": {
        "id": 1,
        "type": "default",
        "stripe_id": "sub_ABC123",
        "stripe_status": "active",
        "stripe_price": "price_ABC123",
        "plan_id": 1,
        "payment_method_type": "card",
        "quantity": 1,
        "trial_ends_at": null,
        "ends_at": null,
        "is_active": true,
        "is_cancelled": false,
        "is_on_trial": false,
        "is_on_grace_period": false,
        "plan": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Basic",
            "slug": "basic",
            "description": "Perfect for individuals and small projects",
            "features": ["5 Projects", "10 GB Storage", "Email Support", "Basic Analytics"],
            "monthly_price": 999,
            "yearly_price": 9990,
            "formatted_monthly_price": "$9.99",
            "formatted_yearly_price": "$99.90",
            "is_active": true,
            "sort_order": 1,
            "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z"
        },
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

request.description:
Create a new subscription for the authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required

**Request Body:**
- `plan_id` (required): ID of the plan to subscribe to
- `payment_method` (required): Stripe payment method ID (e.g., `pm_card_visa` for testing)
- `billing_period` (optional): `monthly` or `yearly` (default: `monthly`)

**Note:** For testing, use Stripe test payment methods like `pm_card_visa`.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "message": "Subscription created successfully",
    "subscription": {
        "id": 1,
        "type": "default",
        "stripe_id": "sub_ABC123",
        "stripe_status": "active",
        "stripe_price": "price_ABC123",
        "plan_id": 1,
        "payment_method_type": "card",
        "quantity": 1,
        "trial_ends_at": null,
        "ends_at": null,
        "is_active": true,
        "is_cancelled": false,
        "is_on_trial": false,
        "is_on_grace_period": false,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

response.name: Already Subscribed

request.description:
Cancel the current user's subscription. The user will retain access until the end of the billing period (grace period).

**Authentication:** Required

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "message": "Subscription cancelled successfully. You will have access until the end of your billing period.",
    "subscription": {
        "id": 1,
        "type": "default",
        "stripe_id": "sub_ABC123",
        "stripe_status": "active",
        "stripe_price": "price_ABC123",
        "plan_id": 1,
        "payment_method_type": "card",
        "quantity": 1,
        "trial_ends_at": null,
        "ends_at": "2025-02-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "is_active": true,
        "is_cancelled": true,
        "is_on_trial": false,
        "is_on_grace_period": true,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T11:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}

request.description:
Resume a cancelled subscription that is still within its grace period.

**Authentication:** Required

**Note:** Can only resume subscriptions that have been cancelled but haven't reached their end date yet.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "message": "Subscription resumed successfully",
    "subscription": {
        "id": 1,
        "type": "default",
        "stripe_id": "sub_ABC123",
        "stripe_status": "active",
        "stripe_price": "price_ABC123",
        "plan_id": 1,
        "payment_method_type": "card",
        "quantity": 1,
        "trial_ends_at": null,
        "ends_at": null,
        "is_active": true,
        "is_cancelled": false,
        "is_on_trial": false,
        "is_on_grace_period": false,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T11:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

response.name: Cannot Resume

request.description:
Change the current subscription to a different plan (upgrade or downgrade).

**Authentication:** Required

**Request Body:**
- `plan_id` (required): ID of the new plan
- `billing_period` (optional): `monthly` or `yearly` (default: `monthly`)

**Note:** Prorated charges or credits will be applied automatically by Stripe.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "message": "Plan changed successfully",
    "subscription": {
        "id": 1,
        "type": "default",
        "stripe_id": "sub_ABC123",
        "stripe_status": "active",
        "stripe_price": "price_XYZ789",
        "plan_id": 2,
        "payment_method_type": "card",
        "quantity": 1,
        "trial_ends_at": null,
        "ends_at": null,
        "is_active": true,
        "is_cancelled": false,
        "is_on_trial": false,
        "is_on_grace_period": false,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T12:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}

item.name: Payment Methods
item.description: Payment method management endpoints for adding, listing, removing, and setting default payment methods.

request.description:
Create a Stripe SetupIntent for securely collecting payment method details on the frontend.

**Authentication:** Required

**Usage:** Use the returned `client_secret` with Stripe.js to collect card details securely.

Get all payment methods associated with the authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required

Add a new payment method to the user's account.

**Authentication:** Required

**Request Body:**
- `token` (required): Stripe payment method ID or token
- `card_holder_name` (required): Name on the card

**Note:** For testing, use Stripe test tokens like `pm_card_visa`.

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
Set a payment method as the user's default for future charges.

**Authentication:** Required

**Request Body:**
- `payment_method_id` (required): The ID of the payment method to set as default

Remove a payment method from the user's account.

**Authentication:** Required

**URL Parameters:**
- `payment_method`: The Stripe payment method ID to delete

item.name: Invoices
item.description: Invoice management endpoints for viewing invoice history and downloading PDFs.

request.description:
Get a list of all invoices for the authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required

**Query Parameters:**
- `include_pending` (optional): Boolean to include pending invoices (default: `false`)

Get details of a specific invoice.

**Authentication:** Required

**URL Parameters:**
- `invoice`: Stripe invoice ID

Download an invoice as a PDF file.

**Authentication:** Required

**URL Parameters:**
- `invoice`: Stripe invoice ID

**Response:** Binary PDF file with `Content-Type: application/pdf`

item.name: Webhook
item.description: Stripe webhook endpoint for handling payment events.

request.description:
Endpoint for receiving Stripe webhook events.

**Authentication:** Uses Stripe signature verification (not Bearer token)

**Headers:**
- `Stripe-Signature` (required): Signature provided by Stripe

**Handled Events:**
- `customer.subscription.created`
- `customer.subscription.updated`
- `customer.subscription.deleted`
- `invoice.paid`
- `invoice.payment_failed`
- `customer.updated`
- `payment_method.attached`
- `payment_method.detached`

**Note:** This endpoint should not be called manually. It's designed to receive events from Stripe.
